snippet: Sheik Ahmad al-Fahad al-Sabah has quietly become one of the most powerful people in global sports, yet remains largely overlooked outside Olympic political circles.
abstract: Sheik Ahmad al-Fahad al-Sabah, jet-setting member of the Kuwaiti royal family, has quietly become one of the most powerful people in global sports, yet remains largely overlooked outside Olympic political circles; as part of International Olympic Committee, he is likely to play a major role in all the big decisions, from which city will host the 2020 Games to which sport will be added to the roster.
lead_paragraph: Sheik Ahmad al-Fahad al-Sabah has quietly become one of the most powerful people in global sports, yet remains largely overlooked outside Olympic political circles.

headline.main: Kuwaiti Sheik’s Influence in Olympic World Grows
headline.print_headline: Kuwaiti Sheik’s Influence in Olympic World Grows
